name: Ghosts Took My Camera
description:
As a former photographer when I hear black and white I think of the large 4x5 viewfinder cameras I used in college. At the same time I played a game called Fatal Frame 2 where you fight ghosts by taking their picture. And that was the inspiration to make a silly game about getting your camera back. 

If you get stuck there is a full play through here showing all intended solutions. **Obviously Spoilers**
